content: make a seamless knit jacket for your active little toddler knit top-down and featuring the beautifully soft and fleecy texture of bernat forever fleece finest the hood is picked up along the neck edge and shaped as you knit practice knit knit 2 together slip slip knit and increase techniques available in 6-24 month sizes this pattern makes a great first garment project materials bernat® forever fleece finest™ 9 9 oz/280 g 888 yds/812 m sizes 6 12 18 24 mos aqua heather 18001 1 1 1 1 ball finished chest 6 mos 20 51 cm 12 mos 22 56 cm 18 mos 23 58 5 cm 24 mos 25 63 5 cm
